info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:31AM EDT until August 07 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PIKE COUNTY... At 1231 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jasper, or 13 miles southeast of Petersburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winslow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
